---
category: news
title: "The Risks & Rewards of Voice-Enabled Commerce"
excerpt: "That smart speaker on your kitchen counter or coffee table has better hearing than you realize. Back in 2016, researchers demonstrated that speech-recognition AI systems like Siri and Alexa are capable of processing signals inaudible to humans. The researchers hid voice commands in online videos and played them back to a smart speaker."
